text:
="preserve">Ivan Stepanovich Utrobin () (March 10, 1934 – June 25, 2020) was a Soviet cross-country skier. He competed during the early 1960s, training at VSS Trud in Moscow Oblast. He earned a bronze medal in the 4 x 10 km event at 1964 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck.
Utrobin died on June 25, 2020 at the age of 86.
